Masked Masterpieces.title: Face Painting
Masked Masterpieces.overview: Masked Masterpieces is an artistic and collaborative event where participants bring their creativity to life through face painting.  It involves a team of one/ two(a painter and a model), to showcase unique designs and themes.
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
Participants have the liberty to decide the theme & design for the event.
Teams must consist of one/two members: one painter and one model.
All participants must bring their own model from their respective divisions.
The painter must complete the face painting within a maximum time limit of 90 minutes.
After the allotted time, the judges will evaluate and score the completed face paintings based on predetermined criteria.
Designs must be original and can earn bonus points for creativity and unique themes.
Hair styling will not be taken into consideration for judging.

Participants must bring their own material required for the competition.
(colours, brushes, glitter, napkins, newspapers to avoid any damage to the garden etc)
Participants are required to bring non-toxic, skin-safe face paint and brushes.
Judging will be based on creativity, precision, originality, and adherence to the chosen theme.
Any kind of stencils/stamps are not allowed.
Use of mobile phones/reference images are strictly prohibited during the contest.
Decisions taken by the judges/coordinators will be final.

Tattoo Craft Rivalry.title: Tattoo Making Competition
Tattoo Craft Rivalry.overview: Dive into the inked realm of creativity! In our tattoo art competition, teams, featuring a painter and model, craft captivating designs on hands or legs within a thrilling 1.25-hour challenge. Judges unravel the tales of originality, creativity, and artistic finesse. Unleash your artistry, leave no trace but a masterpiece!
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
Participants have the liberty to decide their theme & design for the tattoos.
Teams must consist of one/two members: one painter and one model.
All participants must bring their own model from their respective divisions.
Tattoos can be painted on 1 hand (entire) / both hands (entire) / 1 leg (below the knee) / both legs (below the knee). No extra points for covering both hands and legs.

Tattoos are not allowed on any other body parts.
(No tattoos on the face- Check out face painting competition for the same)

Teams must complete the art within a time limit of 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Subsequently, judges will spend the next 45 minutes evaluating each team's artwork.
Hairstyling will not be taken into consideration for judging.
Participants must bring their own paints, pens,  brushes, water holders, rough cloth, and newspaper to avoid any damage to the garden space, etc.
Participants are required to bring non-toxic, skin-safe face paint and brushes
Use of stencils/stamps is not allowed.
Use of mobile phones or any printed reference is strictly prohibited during the competition.
Designs will be judged on factors like originality, creativity, difficulty of design, theme etc.
Decisions of the judges would be final and binding. It should be accepted gracefully.
Participants are responsible for cleaning their workspace after the event.

Makeup Maestro.title: Makeup Competition
Makeup Maestro.overview: Dive into the world of beauty and creativity with our Makeup Event! Express your artistic flair through stunning transformations and innovative looks.  Join us for a glamorous showcase where your makeup skills can shine â€“ participate and let your talent redefine the art of beauty!
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
Emphasize unique and creative makeup looks to showcase individuality.
Participants have the liberty to decide their theme for their makeup. No specified theme.
Teams must consist of one/two members: one makeup artist and one model.
All participants must bring their own model from their respective divisions.
Teams must complete the art within a time limit of 1.5 hours. Subsequently, judges will spend the next 30 minutes evaluating each team's artwork.
Hairstyling will not be taken into consideration for judging.
Participants must bring their own makeup kit.
Use of mobile phones or any printed reference is strictly prohibited during the competition.
Decisions of the judges would be final and binding. It should be accepted gracefully.
Participants are responsible for cleaning their workspace after the event.
Use of natural products of makeup that are not harmful for the skin.
Judges may assess technical skills, including blending, precision, and overall application.

Henna Hustle.title: Mehendi Competition
Henna Hustle.overview: Immerse yourself in the ancient art of henna with our Henna Event! Transform hands into canvases, creating intricate designs that tell stories of tradition and beauty. Join us for a celebration of cultural elegance â€“ participate, and let your henna artistry leave an indelible mark on our vibrant festivities! ðŸŒ¿ðŸŽ‰
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
All participants must bring their own model from their respective divisions.
Participants are expected to bring their own mehendi cones with which they are comfortable.
Use of colored cones is allowed.
The mehendi design should cover at least up to the mid-forearm of the participant. Mehendi can be drawn back & forth on the hands.
Judges will assess and consider the coverage aspect during the evaluation.  Extra points will be allotted for the same.
Use of rough sketches, readymade designs, or any other pictures is NOT allowed.
90 minutes will be given to draw, next half an hour judges will evaluate designs based on creativity and overall presentation.
The decision of the judges would be final and binding. It should be accepted gracefully.
Any kind of stencils/stamps are not allowed.
Use of mobile phones is strictly prohibited during the contest.
Mehendi drawn on feet will not be taken into consideration for judging.
Participants are responsible for cleaning their workspace after the event.
Bring a rough cloth and newspapers to avoid any damage to the venue of the event.
